column5: hmmm, cut down to 4 hooks and is it legal?
You fill it with a couple of minnows?
You fill it with a couple of minnows? Anything really
I guess meat hunters might like it  but I like equipment sized for the fish I am fighting, I like setting the hook and fighting them in  that would be just to get meat IMHO
Looks like a christmas tree ornament.

I guess meat hunters might like it  but I like equipment sized for the fish I am fighting, I like setting the hook and fighting them in  that would be just to get meat IMHO   And you did a fine job this morning bringing up those piggies.
i'm assuming this is a "Crazy Carp Contraption"?  They generally have the craziest ways of catching fish.....
Carp rig designs from Asia are similar...  Looks like a Japanese rig with a method feeder mixed in...
figured it was a crazy carping device.
You'd fill it with crumbs for fish like carp and perch to peck at
Just figured it was a redneck variation on the Alabama rig.
Just figured it was a redneck variation on the Alabama rig.  Isn't that kind of like saying a Canadian variation of maple syrup?
We have our share of rednecks here in Canader ya know. Some of the fellas I grew up with make Gomer and Goober look sophisiticated.
Is it used for chumming or for snagging?
Looks like a 15th century torture device!!
I'm going to gank 4 whitefish at a time with that.

We have our share of rednecks here in Canader ya know. Some of the fellas I grew up with make Gomer and Goober look sophisiticated.  Yep! the reason we have no hillbillies here in Ont is that there are no hills(nothing substantial anyway!)
Looks like an interesting rig.
This is good bait for fishing! Это хорошо приманка для рыбалки!
I'm laughing for probably all the wrong reasons, lol!!!!!!

Seems it is a Sabiki bait catching rig, fill it with bread or some kind of bait , the bait fish go for the bait and the occasional rip by the angler impales/snags  the baitfish.  edit: Seems there are some rigs where the hook is a fly and indeed they actaully take the hook.
I just did the translation. Someone else posted it. Before editing thier post
Looks like a rig someone would use for ocean fishing to catch bait.  Cool rig and can see it working really well.
Looms like one of those tea infusers....hmmmm....homemade chum can ideas....
